-2.Label: Cannot change target temperature while structure is away

-4.Label: Cannot change fan_timer_active while structure is Away

-6.Label: Cannot change HVAC mode while thermostat lock is enabled

-7.Label: Cannot set c and f temperatures simultaneously

-8.Label: Cannot set target temperature closer than N degrees C/F

-9.Label: Temperature C/F value is too low

-10.Label: Temperature C/F value is too high

-11.Label: Temperature C/F value too low for lock temperature

-12.Label: Temperature C/F value too high for lock temperature

-13.Label: Cannot change HVAC mode during energy-saving events

-14.Label: Cannot change HVAC mode to Heat/Cool

-16.Label: Cannot activate fan during smoke/co safety shutoff

-18.Label: Cannot change Away state while emergency heat is on
